datoCmsEvent.title: ANTIRACISM AND THE AMERICAN THEATRE WITH LINDSAY ROBERTS

children.value:
This workshop will serve as a guided collective learning experience as we examine "Antiracism and the American Theatre," developing a deeper understanding of systems of oppression onstage and off, our individual roles in upholding or dismantling white supremacy culture within the industry, and uplifting and amplifying Black JOY through our work.
Bio:
Lindsay Roberts (she/her/hers) is a New York City-based performing arts professional deeply rooted as a stage actress, international educator, and arts management consultant. Lindsay is the founder and principal consultant of LINDSAY ROBERTS CONSULTING, providing a culmination of best practices and solution-minded strategies in the areas of arts education, programming, diversity in the arts, and sustainability in the field. She is a Certified Diversity Professional through the National Diversity Council and specializes in culturally responsive arts programming and Diversity, Equity, and Inclusion in the performing arts sector.
